# Copilot instructions (workspace)

- Keep changes minimal and focused on the requested MVP blog.
- Use Next.js App Router with TypeScript.
- Store data in SQLite via Prisma.
- Admin area under /admin must require authentication.
- Public users can read articles and post comments.
- Prefer server actions / route handlers for writes.
- Avoid adding extra pages/features beyond: article list, article detail, admin login, admin article editor/list.
